actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the ox moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Gore

specialTraits.description: The ox is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.
specialTraits.name: Beast of Burden
